title: Exploring Seattle's Best Third-Wave Coffee Shops - Feastio
content: Known for prioritizing relationships between baristas and customers, roasters and growers, Herkimer Coffee maintains a boutique size with multiple locations across Phinney Ridge, Ravenna, and downtown Seattle.

title: Where to Find Seattle's Best Coffee | Eater Seattle
content: A while back we were chatting with someone in the coffee world who told us how dumb and bad this map is. You can't really make a single list of Seattle's best or most important coffee shops because "coffee shop" can mean so many different things. Do you want someplace to chill on a laptop? Dark roast or light roast? Do you like your cafes to be well-lit gathering spaces a la the Vita ...

title: Double Skinny Macchiato - Bex's Coffee Travels: 13 Specialty Coffee Shops To Visit in Seattle
content: Elm Coffee Roasters (South Lake Union and Pioneer Square) I was able to visit both of Elm Coffee Roasters' Seattle cafes, starting with the location on Ninth Avenue North, a few blocks south of Lake Union.

title: Seattle's Best Coffee Shops [Updated 2025]
content: If you're in Seattle and craving a truly unparalleled caffeine journey, Ghost Note Coffee is a stop you won't want to skip. It's not just coffee; it's an experience that teases your taste buds and warms your heart, leaving you pleasantly enchanted long after your visit! You might also want to check out the best coffee shops in Tacoma.

title: The 20 Best Coffee Shops In Seattle - Seattle - The Infatuation
content: 3 weeks ago - On a hot day, you can also find Boon Boona’s coffee steeped into popsicles at Seattle Pops. ... Monorail Espresso has been a classic since 1980, and this little walk-up window should be on your shortlist of Downtown coffee shops that make it worth spending time Downtown.

title: The Best Coffee In Seattle: 15 Great Seattle Coffee Shops
content: Coffee Loyalists: These shops don’t roast their own beans, but exclusively use beans from one specific roaster. After touring Seattle coffee shops, I saw a lot of Counter Culture, Olympia, and Heart (one of the best coffee roasters in Portland).

title: 10 Most Instagrammable Coffee Shops in Seattle - Emma's Edition -
content: Callus is right across the street from General Porpoise in Pioneer Square. I first featured Callus in Seattle’s Most Instagrammable Places in Pioneer Square. I love how this coffee shop is in the middle of a handful of small boutiques.
